fields.definition:
main:
  name: PersonSerializerByYAML
  fields:
  - name: first_name
    field: CharField
  - name: last_name
    field: CharField
  - name: age
    field: IntegerField
  - name: email
    field: EmailField
  - name: sex
    field: definable_serializer.extra_fields.RadioField
    field_args:
    - - - male
        - Male
      - - other
        - Other
      - - female
        - Female
    field_kwargs:
      allow_blank: false
      allow_null: false
      initial: other
      inline: true
  - name: type
    field: definable_serializer.extra_fields.ChoiceRequiredField
    field_args:
    - - - 
        - '--------------'
      - - family
        - Family
      - - friend
        - Friend
      - - other
        - Other
    field_kwargs:
      allow_blank: false
      allow_null: false
  - name: memo
    field: CharField
    field_kwargs:
      required: false
      max_length: 100
      style:
        base_template: textarea.html
        rows: 5
        placeholder: Hello everyone!
